channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: New Kids on the Block Las Vegas Setlist: Every Song From Night 1 of ‘Right Stuff’ Residency
item.description: 🎶 Dance down memory lane with New Kids on the Block's Vegas show! Which song are you most excited to hear live? 🎉 #NKOTB #VegasResidency

item.title: HAIM’s I quit Is a Memorable Fusion of the Trio’s Past and Present
item.description: Groovin' with HAIM 🎶 Their latest track "I quit" blends nostalgia with a fresh vibe! #HAIM #NewMusicAlert 🌟

item.title: Olivia Dean announces new album titled ‘The Art Of Loving’
item.description: 🎶 Get ready for heart-fluttering tunes! Olivia Dean is bringing us ‘The Art Of Loving.’ Let's dive into this musical masterpiece! 💖 #OliviaDean #NewAlbum

item.title: Death From Above 1979 announce free SummerStage in Central Park show
item.description: Central Park is about to get a whole lot louder 🎸 Don't miss Death From Above 1979 at SummerStage! #RockInCentralPark 🌳🎶

item.title: Twenty One Pilots Announce 2025 North American Tour, Share New Song “The Contract”: Stream
item.description: 🎉🎶 Start saving up and get ready to dance! @twentyonepilots just dropped tour dates and a new hit! 🌟 #TwentyOnePilotsTour2025
